message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I am willing to pay $100 for it.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $110.
